template.name: rmdbcauth
template.value: dbc.requireWithMessage(dbc.isString(authorization) && S(authorization).startsWith('Bearer: '), 'authorization is not a valid string');
template.description: Template for dbc check of auth header

template.name: conlall
template.description: Template for showing whole object in console

template.name: rmdbcboolean
template.description: Template for doing dbc check on booleans
